name: ed-ge
description: The EDucational Game Engine, built with babel.

scripts.rollup: rollup src/engine/Main.js --file ./rollup/Main.js --format es --name 'Main' && rollup src/engine/Components.js --file ./rollup/Components.js --format es --name 'Components' && rollup src/engine/Base.js --file ./rollup/Base.js --format es --name 'Base' && rollup src/engine/Prefabs.js --file ./rollup/Prefabs.js --format es --name 'Prefabs'
scripts.free: rollup src/engine/Main.js --file ./free/Main.js --format iife --name 'Main' && rollup src/engine/Components.js --file ./free/Components.js --format iife --name 'Components' && rollup src/engine/Base.js --file ./free/Base.js --format iife --name 'Base'&& rollup src/engine/Prefabs.js --file ./free/Prefabs.js --format iife --name 'Prefabs'

author: B. Ricks, and CSCI 2510 @ unomaha.edu
